properties.areaDesc: New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 20 at 3:06PM EST until February 22 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Small Craft Advisory, which is in effect from 2 PM Friday to 4 AM
EST Saturday.

* WINDS...Southwest winds 15 to 25 knots. Gusts to 30 knots.

* WAVES...4 to 7 feet.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than 4
feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY
